element.title: Mutton Stew
element.shortDesc: During summer we generally avoid to eat rich food. But when it comes to mutton, the decision become difficult 😉. For this kind of situation 'mutton stew' is the perfect food for all. The recipe is very simple and have some mild flavours. You will love this when you make it.
element.ingrediants:
• 10 pieces of mutton.
  • 6 tsp of hung curd.
  • 1 onion thinly sliced.
  • 1 tsp of ginger and garlic paste.
  • 2 green chilies.
  • 3 tsp of white oil.
  • 3 green cardamoms.
  • 2 bay leaves.
  • 2 tsp turmeric powder.
  • Salt and sugar.
  • Warm water.
element.process:
• Marinate the mutton pieces with hung curd, ginger and garlic paste, 1 tsp turmeric powder and some salt for 2-3 hours.
  • Then heat oil in a pressure cooker.
  • Add the bay leaves and green cardamoms. Saute it for a minute.
  • Then add the onion slices. Fry this till golden.
  • Add the marinated mutton. Mix it well for 6 minutes.
  • Add some salt, pinch of sugar, green chilies and remaining turmeric powder. Mix it for another 6 minutes.
  • Add 2 cups of warm water and cover the cooker. Wait for 6 whistles or untill the meat is done.
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this with toasted bread or white rice ...

element.title: Pineapple Milkshake
element.shortDesc: I love the sweetness and juiciness of pineapple in summer. Then why not make a milkshake with this one in a hot afternoon?? Believe me you will love this milkshake more than anything 😊 ...
element.ingrediants:
• 10-15 cubes of pineapple.
  • 2 scoops of vanilla ice cream.
  • 1 cup of chilled milk.
  • 1 tsp sugar.
  • Pinch of salt.
  • Whipped cream for garnishing.
element.process:
• Keep the pineapple cubes in freezer for 1 hour.
  • First blend the milk, ice cream, sugar and salt for 2 minutes.
  • Then add the frozen pineapple. Blend this for another 2-3 minutes.
  • If you want more sweetness then add another tsp of sugar.
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this chilled drink with some whipped cream on top ...

element.title: Dum Aloo
element.shortDesc: We all love to eat 'aloor dom' along with 'luchi' or 'kochuri'. This is our comfort food. It also goes very well with 'pulao' or 'fried rice'. This one is my mom's recipe. She make the tastiest aloor dom ever. Yesterday I tried this recipe and it came out perfectly.Just give it a try.
element.ingrediants:
• 10 pieces of baby potatoes.
  • 1 onion thinly sliced.
  • 1 tsp of ginger and garlic paste.
  • 1 tomato finely chopped.
  • 3 green chilies.
  • A handfull of green peas.
  • Whole spices(1 small cinnamon stick, 2 bay leaves, 4 green cardamoms, 4 cloves, 1 tsp cumin seeds).
  • 2 tsp turmeric powder.
  • 1 tsp red chili powder.
  • 1 tsp roasted cumin powder.
  • 1 tsp roasted coriander powder.
  • Salt and sugar.
  • 4 tsp mustard oil.
  • 2 tsp ghee / clarified butter.
  • Warm water.
element.process:
• Half boil the baby potatoes with some salt and peeled them. Keep aside.
  • Take a pan. Heat mustard oil.
  • Add the peeled potatoes and 1 tsp of turmeric powder in the hot oil. Fry them for 4-5 minutes. The potatoes will get a nice color.
  • Remove them from oil and keep aside.
  • In the remaining oil add 2 tsp ghee.
  • Add the whole spices and 2 tsp sugar into the hot oil. Saute them for a minute. Caramelize the sugar.
  • Now add thinly sliced onion. Fry them untill golden brown.
  • Add ginger and garlic paste. Mix it for a minute.
  • Add chopped tomato, salt, 1 tsp turmeric powder and green chilies. Cook this in slow flame for 5-6 minutes.
  • When the tomato become mushy add red chili powder, roasted cumin and coriander powder. Mix this very well for 5 minutes.
  • When the oil starts separating add fried baby potatoes. Mix again for 4 minutes.
  • Now add some warm water and green peas. Cook this untill the potatoes are 100% done.
  • Check the seasoning and adjust it according to your taste.
  • Turn off you gas.
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this chilled drink with some whipped cream on top ...

element.title: Spicy Macaroni with Mushroom
element.shortDesc: Pasta is one of my favourite snack. Last week I had some boiled pasta, cooked sauce and some mushrooms in my fridge. Then I made this dish. I did not follow any particular recipe. But it came out delicious. Make this at your kitchen and surprise your family.
element.ingrediants:
• For sauce:
    • 3-4 ripe tomatoes.
    • 2 cloves of garlic finely chopped.
    • 2 tsp black pepper powder.
    • 2 tsp sugar.
    • Some Italian herb seasoning.
    • Some salt.
    • 4 tsp butter.
    • Some warm water.
  • For pasta:
    • 2 cups of macaroni pasta.
    • A handfull of mushrooms.
    • 1 clove of garlic finely chopped.
    • 2 tsp white oil.
    • Some salt.
    • 1 tsp black pepper powder.
element.process:
• For Sauce:
  • Put the tomatoes in some boiling water for 2 minutes. Peel the skin and blend the tomatoes very well. Keep aside.
  • Heat the butter.
  • Add chopped garlic. Saute it for a minute.
  • Then add the tomato puree. Mix this very well.
  • Add some salt, sugar, black pepper powder and some Italian herb seasoning. Now cook this thing for 20-30 minutes in slow flame.
  • If it become dry add some warm water.
  • Check the seasoning and adjust it according to your taste.
  • Turn off your gas. You can keep this sauce in a air tight containor for 1-2 months in refrigerator.
  • For Pasta:
  • Put the macaroni in some boiling water along with some salt. When it become 90% done drain the water.
  • Take a pan. Heat 2 tsp of white oil.
  • Add chopped garlic. Saute it for a minute.
  • Add mushrooms. Fry this in high flame for 3-4 minutes.
  • Add the boiled macaroni. Again mix this for 4 minutes.
  • Now add some salt, black pepper powder and 3-4 tsp of the cooked sauce. Mix this very well for 5 minutes in high flame.
  • Check the seasoning and turn off your gas.
element.completionStatement: Your Spicy macaroni with mushroom is ready ...
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this hot with your family ...

element.title: Omelet Curry
element.shortDesc: We all love to eat omelet. My grandma used to make this dish with her love and care. That is why it always turned out so tasty. Today I am sharing this recipe with little changes. Please make this at your home.
element.ingrediants:
• 2 eggs.
  • 1 big onion ( half finely chopped and half thinly sliced).
  • 1 tsp ginger and garlic paste.
  • 2 tsp tomato ketchup.
  • 3 green chilies.
  • 4 tsp milk.
  • 1 tsp turmeric powder.
  • 1 tsp cumin powder.
  • 1 tsp cumin seeds.
  • 1 bay leaf.
  • Mustard oil.
  • Warm water.
  • Salt and sugar.
element.process:
• Beat 1 egg with some salt, 2 tsp milk.
  • Then add some chopped onion and green chili. Mix it very well.
  • Heat some mustard oil in a pan.
  • Add the egg mixture in the hot oil. Make an omelet. Then remove it from the pan and keep aside.
  • Make another one following the same process.
  • Now heat 4 tsp oil.
  • Add cumin seeds and 1 bay leaf. Saute it for a minute.
  • Then add thinly sliced onion. Cook this till golden brown.
  • Add ginger and garlic paste. Mix it well for 2 minutes.
  • Add tomato ketchup, turmeric powder, cumin powder, some salt and half tsp sugar. Mix this very well.
  • Then add some warm water and 2 green chilies. Let it boil.
  • Cut each omelet in three pieces and add into the curry.
  • Cook this for 10 minutes in slow flame.
  • Check the seasoning and turn off your gas.
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this hot with plain rice ...

element.title: Mutton Korma
element.shortDesc: Last weekend I had a party in my house. Among all the foods, the main attraction was Mutton Korma. This dish is very rich itself. Always serve this with light rice item. Just give it a try.
element.ingrediants:
• 10-12 with bone mutton pieces.
  • 1 big onion thinly sliced.
  • Ginger and garlic paste 2 tsp.
  • Two green chilies.
  • Salt and sugar.
  • Hung curd 10 tsp.
  • 1 cinnamon stick.
  • 5 green cardemoms.
  • 4 cloves.
  • 1 star anis.
  • Turmeric powder 3 tsp.
  • Cumin powder 2 tsp.
  • Coriander powder 2 tsp.
  • Red chili powder 1 tsp.
  • Kewra water half tsp.
  • Mustard oil 1 tsp.
  • Ghee 4 tsp.
  • Warm water.
element.process:
• Marinate the mutton pieces with 2 tsp turmeric,red chilli powder,mustadr oil and salt. Keep aside for 1 hour.
  • Heat some white oil in a pan. Fry thinly sliced onion untill golden brown. Remove from the oil and let it cool down.
  • Make a paste of brown onion , 5 tsp curd and two green chilies. Keep aside.
  • Now add all the powder and 5 tsp water in the remaining curd. Stir it very well. Keep aside.
  • Take a pressure cooker. Heat 4 tsp ghee and 1 tsp mustard oil.
  • Add cinnamon stick,cloves,green cardemoms and star anis. Saute it for a minute.
  • Then add the ginger and garlic paste. Fry it for 2 minutes.
  • Add the curd and powder mixture. Cook this on slow flame for 20 minutes.
  • Then add the marinated mutton. Mix it well and cook this for 15 minutes in high flame.
  • Then add brown onion mixture,salt and some sugar. Stir this very well and cook it another 10 minutes.
  • Now add very little water and kewra water. Give it 4-5 whistle or untill the meat become tendor.
  • Check the seasoning and turn off your gas.
element.garnishment: • Serve hot with pulao, jeera rice, fried rice ...

element.title: Mutton Tarka (Dhaba Style)
element.shortDesc: In India 'dhaba' means roadside food joints. They offer delicious and spicy meals. Among all of their meals, 'tarka-roti' is the famous one. I once ate 'Mutton Tarka' from them and it was super tasty. Last week I try this tarka recipe and reveal that it tastes exactly like 'dhaba tarka'. Just follow the recipe and impress your family.
element.ingrediants:
• 1 medium bowl of minced mutton.
  • 2 small bowl of whole moong lentil.
  • 1 big onion finely chopped.
  • 2 tsp ginger & garlic paste.
  • 1 big tomato finely chopped.
  • 4 green chilies.
  • Spice powder (1 tsp cumin, 2 tsp coriander, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp garam masala).
  • 2 tsp dry fenugreek leaves.
  • 1 small bowl of freshly chopped coriander leaves.
  • 6 tsp of mustard oil.
  • 1 cube of butter.
  • Salt.
  • Water.
element.process:
• Half boil the minced mutton and green lentil separately in pressure cooker with some water and salt. Keep them aside.
  • Now take a pan. Heat mustard oil.
  • Add chopped onion. Fry them till golden brown.
  • Add ginger & garlic paste. Mix it for 2 minutes.
  • Add chopped tomato, green chilies and some salt. Cook this untill tomatoes become mushy.
  • Now add all of the spice powder. Mix it very well for 3 minutes.
  • Then add boiled mutton. Cook it for 10 minutes in medium flame.
  • Then add boiled lentil. Cook this for another 10 minutes.
  • Now crush the fenugreek leaves by your palms and add into the tarka. Mix it.
  • Then add chopped coriander leaves and mix this very well.
  • Turn off your gas and put the butter on top.
element.completionStatement: Your Mutton Tarka (Dhaba Style) is ready ...
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this hot with roti, naan ...

element.title: Macher Kalia (Different Style)
element.shortDesc: We Bengalis are very fond of fish. Our common meal is fish curry and rice. This recipe is one of the fish curry which we make in occasions and gatherings. I already gave you one kaliya recipe and this one is also very tasty. Try this at your home and let me know how it turns out.
element.ingrediants:
• 4 with bone fish pieces (rui / rohu / katla).
  • 4 tsp onion paste.
  • 1 tsp ginger paste.
  • 3 tsp hung curd.
  • 3 tsp turmeric powder.
  • 1 tsp cumin powder.
  • 1 tsp coriander powder.
  • Half tsp red chili powder.
  • Whole spices ( 1 small cinnamon stick, 3 green cardemoms, 3 cloves, 1 bay leaf)
  • Salt & sugar.
  • 2 green chilies.
  • 8 tsp mustard oil.
  • Warm water.
  • 1 tsp ghee / clarified butter.
element.process:
• Wash the fish pieces very well and marinate those with some salt and 2 tsp of turmeric powder. Keep aside for 20 minutes.
  • Take a pan. Heat 8 tsp mustard oil.
  • Add the marinated fish pieces in hot oil and fry both sides untill golden brown. Then remove those from oil.
  • In the same oil add whole spices. Saute it for 2 minutes.
  • Add onion paste. Fry it for 5 minutes.
  • Now take a small bowl. Add hung curd, little water, cumin and coriander powder, ginger paste, turmeric & red chili powder. Mix it very well and add into the pan. Cook this for another 4 minutes.
  • When oil starts separate add fried fish pieces. Mix this very well.
  • Then add some warm water, green chilies, salt and half tsp sugar. Cook this for 5 minutes.
  • Check the seasoning.
  • Turn off your gas and add 1 tsp ghee.
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this with hot rice ...

element.title: Macher chop (Fish Croquettes)
element.shortDesc: This is one of my favourite snacks in the evening along with tea. You can get this chop from many fast food centers in West Bengal. But today you can make this Bengali style macher chop in your own kitchen. Just follow the recipe and you will get this mouth watering snack very easily.
element.ingrediants:
• 5 pieces of fish with bone (bhetki / rui / katla).
  • 1 boiled potato.
  • 1 egg.
  • 4 tsp milk.
  • Bread crumbs.
  • 2 tsp turmeric powder.
  • 2 green chilies.
  • 1 clove of garlic chopped.
  • 1 inch ginger chopped.
  • 1 small onion finely chopped.
  • Spice powder (1 tsp roasted cumin powder, 2 tsp roasted coriander powder, 1 tsp dry mango powder, 1 tsp red chili powder).
  • Some chopped coriander leaves.
  • 7 tsp mustard oil.
  • White oil for deep fry.
element.process:
• Marinate the fish pieces with turmeric powder and some salt. Keep it for 20 minutes.
  • Take a pan. Heat the mustard oil.
  • Fry thy fish pieces both sides one by one till golden color. Remove those in a plate and let it become cool.
  • Now discard the skin and debone the fish pieces. Make the fish crumble a little bit.
  • Mash the boiled potato with your hand and keep aside.
  • In the same pan add chopped ginger and garlic in the remaining hot mustard oil. Saute it for a minute.
  • Then add chopped onion and green chilies. Fry it for 6 minutes.
  • Now add all of the spice powder and salt. Mix it well.
  • Add the mashed potato in the mixture. Mix this very well.
  • Then add the debone fish and coriander leaves. Mix this for 5 minutes.
  • Check the seasoning and adjust it according to your taste.
  • Let this mixture cool down completely.
  • Take a bowl. Beat an egg with pinch of salt and 4 tsp milk.
  • Put lots of bread crumbs in a flat plate.
  • Take a small portion of mixture in your hand and give it any shape of your choice.
  • Dip it in the egg and then coat this with bread crumbs. Again dip it in the egg and coat it with bread crumbs.
  • You have to do the ciating process twice.
  • Keep those coated chops rest for 10 minutes.
  • Now fry those one by one in hot white oil for 5 minutes. Remove the chops in a paper towel.
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this hot with some ketchup ...

element.title: Dry Chili Fish with Mushroom
element.shortDesc: This is a very simple and easy recipe. You can serve this as starter or main course. You can also substitute fish with chicken. It tastes delicious. Try this at your home and tell me about your experience.
element.ingrediants:
• 2 fish filets cut into small cubes (bhetki / tillapia / basa).
  • 10 tsp all purpose flour.
  • 1 tsp black pepper powder.
  • 2 tsp soy sauce.
  • 3 tsp chili sauce.
  • Half onion cut into cubes.
  • 1 clove of garlic chopped.
  • 10 mushrooms.
  • Half green capsicum chopped.
  • 2 green chilies chopped.
  • 3 tsp tomato ketchup.
  • 1 tsp msg.
  • Some chopped green onions.
  • Salt.
  • Some warm water.
  • White oil for deep fry.
element.process:
• Wash the mushrooms very well and cut into half.
  • Take a bowl. Put all purpose flour.
  • Add some salt, black pepper powder and some warm water. Make a lump free, semi thick batter.
  • Now add 1 tsp soy sauce and 1 tsp chili sauce into the batter. Mix it well.
  • Heat white oil in a pan for deep fry.
  • Take a fish cube, dip it into the batter and put into the hot oil. Dont overcrowd the pan. Fry those for 6-7 minutes and remove in a paper towel.
  • Now take another pan. Heat 2 tsp white oil.
  • Add chopped garlic and green chilies in hot oil. Saute it for a minute.
  • Then add onion cubes, chopped capsicum, mushrooms and pinch of salt. Fry this in high flame for 4 minutes.
  • Add very little hot water, tomato ketchup, 1 tsp soy sauce, 2 tsp chili sauce and 1 tsp msg. Mix it very well for 3 minutes.
  • Now add fried fish cubes in the sauce. Saute it in high flame for 3 minutes.
  • The fried fish will soak the sauce and it will become dry.
  • Turn off your gas and sprinkle some green onions.
element.completionStatement: Your dry chili fish with mushroom is ready ...
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this hot with chowmein ...

element.title: Kheema Biriyani (Minced meat Biriyani)
element.shortDesc: In India "biriyani" is a very popular dish. There are plenty of variations in biriyani. The process is a little lenthy but it tastes delicious. Yesterday I took an attempt on making Kheema biriyani, after the entire process I realize it is the easiest one. That is why I am sharing this recipe with you because it is one of the tastiest and easiest biriyani ever. Try this at your home and make yourself special.
element.ingrediants:
• 2 cups minced mutton.
  • Basmati rice 4 cups.
  • 1 onion sliced.
  • Ginger and garlic paste 2 tsp.
  • Curd 4 tsp.
  • Biriyani masala 5 tsp.( from any indian store).
  • Whole spices (cumin seed 1 tsp, 5 green cardemom, 6 cloves, 1 star anis, 1 small cinnamon stick).
  • Yellow food colour.
  • 2 green chilies.
  • Clarified butter/ghee 8 tsp.
  • 2 tsp rose water.
  • Salt and sugar.
  • Water.
element.process:
• Wash the basmati rice in cold water very well and soak this for 1 hour.
  • Take a pan. Heat 3 tsp ghee.
  • Add sliced onion in hot ghee and fry it till golden brown.
  • Then add ginger & garlic paste. Mix it for 3 minutes.
  • Then add the minced meat. Mix this very well.
  • Now add some salt, green chilies, biriyani masala and 4 tsp beaten curd. Mix this very well.
  • Add some warm water and cook this in slow flame for 30 minutes. Keep some gravy in the curry.
  • Meat should be 100% done and check the seasoning.
  • Now take another vessel. Boil lots of water.
  • Add 4 table spoon salt and whole spices in boiling water.
  • Then add the soaked rice.
  • When the rice will 80% done, drain all water.
  • Now take another pan. Put a layer of meat curry and then put a layer of rice. Put 2 tsp ghee and 1 tsp rose water on top of it.
  • Repeat the same process. Lastly add pinch of food color on top of the last layer of rice.
  • Cover the pan with a tight lid and turn on the gas.
  • Keep the gas on high flame first for 4 minutes, then bring it low for another 15 minutes.
  • Let it rest for 10 minutes then open the lid.
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this hot with raita or any type of gravy ...

element.title: Chicken Pakora
element.shortDesc: How about a crazy snack in a rainy evening ?? Ohh yeaah its Pakora time !! In Kolkata we get this kind of chicken pakora from fast food centers. If you follow this recipe you can get the same flavour from your homemade pakora.
element.ingrediants:
• 10 boneless chicken medium size pieces.
  • 3 tsp lemon juice.
  • 2 tsp black pepper powder.
  • Half onion finely chopped.
  • 1 tsp finely chopped ginger.
  • 2 tsp finely chopped garlic.
  • 2 green chilies chopped.
  • 2 eggs.
  • 10 tsp Cornflour.
  • Salt to taste.
  • White oil for deep fry.
element.process:
• Marinate the chicken pieces with lemon juice, some salt and 1 tsp black pepper powder. Keep it in the refrigerator for 2-3 hours.
  • Take a bowl. Add 2 eggs. Beat these eggs very well.
  • Then add cornflour little by little. Mix this well.
  • Then add chopped onion, ginger, garlic and green chilies. Mix it.
  • Adjust the seasoning by adding salt and pepper powder. Mix this entire thing very well.
  • Dont add water in the mixture. If this become too runny you can add some more cornflour.
  • Heat 3 inches of white oil in a kadai / pan.
  • Take a chicken piece, dip into the mixture and put into the hot oil. Fry it untill golden brown.
  • Remove it in a paper towel.
  • Now again take the fried chicken, dip it into the mixture anf fry it. You have to do the process twice.
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this hot with some ketchup ...

element.title: Mutton Pulao / Yakhni Pulao
element.shortDesc: This recipe is an authentic pulao recipe. In any gathering you can make this dish and it will be blast. This pulao is super tasty and very easy to make. You just have to be perfect about the measurement. Please try this at your home.
element.ingrediants:
• 10 small size mutton pieces.
  • 2 cups basmati rice.
  • 1 small onion cut into 4 pieces and 1 medium size onion thinly sliced.
  • 2 inch ginger.
  • 4 cloves garlic.
  • Whole spices (5 green cardamoms, 6 cloves, 2 small cinnamon stick, 10 whole black pepper, 4 dry red chili).
  • 2 tsp roasted coriander powder.
  • 1 tsp cumin seeds.
  • 1 tsp ghee.
  • 4 tsp white oil.
  • Salt.
  • Warm water.
element.process:
• Wash the rice very well and soak in cold water for 1 hour.
  • Take a pressure cooker. Put the mutton pieces, big 4 pieces of onion, ginger, garlic, cumin seeds, coriander powder, whole spices, 3 tsp salt and 2 cups of water. Mix these things with a spatula and pressure cook this untill the meat become tender. Keep aside.
  • The juice of the meat should be salty because the rice will cook in this juice.
  • Now take a pan. Heat 4 tsp white oil.
  • Add thinly sliced onion. Fry it till golden. Do not make the onion dark.
  • In this add boiled mutton along with all those spices, onion, ginger and garlic. Keep the juice separately.
  • Cook this entire thing for 10 minutes in high flame. You have to give the meat a nice brown color.
  • After that put all the juices into the meat and also some warm water. Let it boil.
  • Taste the juice at this point. It should be salty.
  • Now add the soaked rice and 1 tsp ghee into the boiling juice. Stir this once, cover the pan and cook it untill the water dry out.
  • Here measurement is very important. The ratio of the juice and rice should be perfect. Because you will cook the rice with the juice and meat.
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this hot with any type of gravy ...

element.title: Stawberry Milkshake
element.shortDesc: How about a chilled milkshake in a crazy hot afternoon?? Everybody will say "yessss" .. Lets do this with the sweet flavour of strawberry.
element.ingrediants:
• 10 strawberries.
  • 1 cup full fat milk.
  • 3 scoops of vanilla / strawberry ice cream.
  • 3 drops of vanilla essence.
element.process:
• Wash the strwberries very well and cut those into small pieces.
  • Take a blander. Put milk and stawberries first. Blend it for 3 minutes in high speed.
  • Then add ice cream and vanilla essence. Blen this for another 1 minute.
  • If your strawberries are not sweet enough you can add some powdered sugar.
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this chill in a hot afternoon ...

element.title: Dahi Chicken (Ma's recipe)
element.shortDesc: "Lajawab" is the only compliment about mom's recipe. My mom make this dish in a very easy and simple way. But it tastes delicious. You will need very few ingredients for this dish. This the best recipe for teenagers because its very easy to make.
element.ingrediants:
• 10-15 with bone chicken pieces.
  • 1 large onion thinly sliced.
  • 2 cloves of garlic finely chopped.
  • 5 table spoon hung curd.
  • 2 tsp black pepper powder.
  • 3 green chilies.
  • 1 tsp fenugreek leave powder.
  • Salt.
  • 4 table spoon white oil.
element.process:
• Wash the chicken pieces very well and marinate with hung curd, black pepper powder and some salt. Keep it for 3-4 hours.
  • Take a pan. Heat white oil.
  • Add chopped garlic. Saute it for 2 minutes.
  • Add sliced onion. Cook this for 4 minutes. Do not make the onion brown.
  • Then add the marinated chicken. Stir this well. Cover the pan and cook it in slow flame for 10 minutes.
  • Chicken will loose lots of water.
  • Then add green chilies. Cook this untill the chicken is 100% done.
  • Check the seasoning. Adjust it according to your taste. You can add some warm water if the chicken dries out.
  • Lastly add fenugreek leave powder. Mix it and cover the pan for 2 minutes. Then serve it.
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this hot with roti ...

element.title: Lassi (Yogurt smoothie)
element.shortDesc: Lassi is the most popular drink of Punjab, India. Nowadays we can get lassi almost everywhere. Its a very refreshing drink during summer. Flavoured lassi are also easily available in the market. But I personally prefer plain lassi. Just follow this recipe and you will get the best lassi from your kitchen.
element.ingrediants:
• 2 cups of plain yogurt.
  • 1 cup of chilled milk.
  • 3 tsp of powdered sugar.
  • 1 tsp of rose water.
  • A pinch of salt.
element.process:
• Take a blender. Put the yogurt, milk and sugar. Blend it for 2 minutes in high speed.
  • Then add rose water and salt. Again blend it for 2 minutes.
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this supercool drink in summer afternoon ...
• Enjoy this hot as appetizer ...
element.ingrediants:
• 2 large boiled, peeled potatoes.
  • Some boiled green peas.
  • 2 cups all purpose flour.
  • 3-4 tsp ghee / clarified butter.
  • Salt to taste.
  • 1 tsp cumin seeds.
  • Half tsp chopped ginger.
  • 1 tsp chopped green chilies.
  • 1 tsp cumin powder.
  • 1 tsp coriander powder.
  • 1 tsp dry mango powder.
  • 1 tsp red chili powder.
  • Some chopped coriander leaves.
  • White oil.
  • Some warm water.
element.process:
• Dough:
  • Take 2 cups of flour in a bowl.
  • Add some salt and 4 tsp melted ghee. Mix all this with your hand for 5 minutes.
  • Then add little warm water into flour and mix it. The dough should be semi soft. So, do not add water at a time. Go for little by little.
  • Knead the dough very well for 10 minutes. Cover the dough with a damp cloth for 20 minutes.
  • Filling:
  • Make sure you boil the potatoes in little water. If the potatoes absorb water it will ruin the dish.
  • Half mash the boiled potatoes with your hand. Dont make it mushy.
  • Take a pan and heat 2 tsp oil.
  • Add cumin seeds in hot oil. Saute it for a minute.
  • Then add chopped ginger and green chilies. Saute it for 2 minutes.
  • Add the half mashed potatoes. Saute it for a minute.
  • Then add all the powder and some salt. Mix it very well for 5 minutes.
  • Check the seasoning.
  • Add boiled peas and coriander leaves. Mix it again for 3 minutes.
  • Keep this mixture aside and let it cool down completely.
  • Process:
  • Now knead the dough again for just a minute and make medium size balls from it.
  • Flatten a ball to a 6 inch circle. The circle should not be too much thin.
  • Take a knife and cut the circle to 2 semi circles.
  • Now put 1 semi circle on your palm. Dip your fingure into water and apply water along the edges.
  • Take one end in the center and overlap it to the another end for making a cone.
  • Put the potato mixture into the cone. Seal the edges properly.
  • Deep fry the samosas into hot oil untill golden brown.
  • Oil should be medium hot. You have to fry it for approx 10-12 minutes. Otherwise it will not become crunchy.

element.completionStatement: Your Kasuri Methi Murg Masala is ready ...

• 300 ml sweet condensed milk (1 small can).
  • Plain yogurt 1medium cup.
  • Fresh pulp of 2 ripe mangoes.
  • 10-15 cashews finely chopped.
  • Water.
element.process:
• Initial Steps.
  • Put mango pulp and yogurt in a blender. Blend it very well.
  • Then add the condensed milk and again blend this very well.
  • Add the chopped cashews in the mixture and just stir this with a spoon.
  • Pressure cooker method:
  • Put the mixture in a bowl.
  • Preheat the cooker for 3-5 minutes.
  • Then put an inch of water.
  • Then put an iron strand.
  • Now place the bowl on top of the strand and cover the cooker.
  • Turn of the gas after 12-15 minutes. Keep it there for another 5-6 minutes.
  • Yogurt should be set in the cooker.
  • Oven method:
  • Put the mixture in a bowl.
  • Preheat your oven in 200c for 10 minutes.
  • Take a baking tray. Put some water.
  • Then place the bowl on the tray.
  • Bake this for 20-25 minutes in 180c. Let it rest for another 10 minutes.
  • Post Steps:
  • Now keep this yogurt in room temperature for 15-20 minutes.
  • After that put it in the refrigerator for 1-2 hours.
element.shortDesc: "Doi" is a very popular dessert among Bengalis. But "bhapa doi" is a very traditional Bengali dessert. element.title: Bhapa Doi (Baked Yogurt) - Mango flavour

element.garnishment: • Sprinkle some lemon juice and enjoy this snack with mint chutney & onion rings.
element.ingrediants:
• 4 Chicken leg pieces.
  • 6 tsp hung curd.
  • Salt.
  • 2 tsp fresh ginger & garlic paste.
  • 3 tsp lemon juice.
  • 4 tsp mustard oil.
  • 5 tsp store bought tandoori masala or 1 tsp (cumin powder, coriander powder, red chili powder, black pepper powder, kashmiri mirch powder, garam masala powder, dry fenugreek leave powder).
  • Some butter for basting.
element.process:
• Initial Steps.
  • Wash the chicken pieces and make some slits with sharp knife. Pat dry the chicken.
  • Add some salt, ginger & garlic paste and lemon juice to the chicken. Mix this very well with your hand. Keep it aside for 30 minutes.
  • Now take a big bowl. Add mustard oil.
  • Then add 1 tsp red chili powder and 1 tsp kashmiri red chili powder. Mix it and let it rest for 4-5 minutes. From this you will get nice red color.
  • Then add all the powder 1 tsp each in the oil. Mix it.
  • If you are using store bought powder, just put the powder in oil and let it rest for 5 minutes.
  • After that put hung curd and salt. Mix it very well.
  • Now add the chicken pieces. Massage the chicken pieces with masala very well with your hand. Cover the bowl and keep it in refrigerator overnight or atleast 4-5 hours.
  • Oven method
  • Preheat your oven at the highest temperature for 10-15 minutes.
  • Now take a grill pan. Place the matinated chicken pieces and put in the oven for 20 minutes in 450F.
  • Then bast some butter on the both side. Turn the chicken pieces on other side and follow the same procedure.
  • Turn off your oven and let it rest for another 5 minutes.
  • If you need more juicy chicken bast some more butter on top.
  • Gas method
  • Take a iron skillet / pan. Heat it very well.
  • Put very little oil and spread all over the hot pan.
  • Now put the chicken pieces in the hot pan. Dont overcrowd the pan.
  • Cook each side for 15-20 minutes in medium high flame. Bast some butter in between.
  • To get the smokey flavour turn your burner and hold the chicken pieces in direct flame each side for 1 minute.
element.shortDesc: This dish dont need any explanation. Its very popular in India and nowadays all over the world. There was a rumor that without "tandoor/oven" you cannot make tandoori. But believe me today I am sharing "oven method & gas method" of making tandoori. Please give it a try at your home and prove the rumor wrong.
element.title: Chicken Tandoori

element.completionStatement: Your Kasuri Methi Murg Masala is ready ...
element.garnishment: • Enjoy this hot with naan, roti or rice ...
element.ingrediants:
• Chicken medium size 10-15 pieces with bone.
  • 1 big onion thinly sliced.
  • 2 tsp ginger & garlic paste.
  • 1 small chopped tomato.
  • 3 green chilies.
  • 5 tsp hung curd.
  • Methi / fenugreek seeds 1 tsp.
  • Turmeric powder 2 tsp.
  • Cumin powder 1 tsp.
  • Coriander powder 1 tsp.
  • Black pepper powder 1 tsp.
  • Kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves 2 tsp.
  • Salt & sugar.
  • Mustard oil 5 tsp.
  • Warm water.
element.process:
• Wash the chicken pieces and marinate with hung curd, some salt, 1 tsp turmeric powder and 1 tsp black pepper powder.
  • Keep the marinated chicken in refrigerator for 2-3 hours.
  • Then heat mustard oil in a pan.
  • Add methi / fenugreek seeds in hot oil. Saute it for 1-2 minutes. When the aroma starts to come remove the seeds from oil. We need only the flavour of methi. Dont burn the seeds in oil because it will make the dish bitter.
  • Then add sliced onion in flavoured hot oil. Fry it for 7-8 minutes.
  • Add ginger & garlic paste. Mix this for 3 minutes.
  • Then add chopped tomato and 1 tsp salt. Cook this for 5 minutes.
  • When the tomato become mushy add (turmeric, cumin, coriander) powder, pinch of sugar and green chilies. Cook this for 4 minutes.
  • When the oil starts separate add marinated chicken. Mix this very well in high flame for 6 minutes.
  • Then cover the pan, turn the flame to medium and cook this for 25 minutes. Chicken will loose its own juice.
  • Stir the curry twice in between. If the chicken becomes dry add some warm water.
  • Check the seasoning and adjust it according to your taste. The chicken should be done 100%.
  • Lastly take kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves in your palms, crush it and add in the curry. Mix it for 2 minutes.
  • Then turn of the gas and let it rest for 5 minutes.
element.shortDesc: I made this dish yesterday and it was a blast. So, I am sharing this recipe with you. Please give it a try and let me know about your experience.
element.title: Kasuri Methi Murg Masala

element.garnishment: • Enjoy this with raita / any type of gravy.
element.ingrediants:
• Basmati rice 2 cups.
  • 2 potatoes cut into square pieces.
  • 2 carrots chopped.
  • Some french beans chopped.
  • 10 pieces of cauliflower florets.
  • Some green peas.
  • Whole spice (1 cinnamon stick, 5 cloves, 6 green cardemom, 2 bay leaf, 1 staranis, 1 tsp cumin seeds).
  • Hung curd 4 tsp.
  • 1 onion thinly sliced.
  • 3 green chilies.
  • 5 tsp of biriyani masala.
  • 2 tsp ginger & garlic paste.
  • Some saffron.
  • 4 tsp milk.
  • Salt & sugar.
  • 5 tsp Ghee / clarified butter.
  • 1 tsp rose water/kewra water.
  • White oil.
  • Water.
element.process:
• Wash the rice and soak in water for 30 minutes.
  • Take a small bowl. Pour 4 tsp milk and add some saffron strands in it. Soak this for 30 minutes.
  • Fry the potatoes, carrots, cauliflower and beans 50% in white oil. Then keep aside.
  • Now take a pan heat 3 tsp white oil.
  • Add onion slices. Fry it for 12 minutes.
  • Then add ginger & garlic paste. Mix it for 3 minutes.
  • Add salt, pinch of sugar and biriyani masala. Mix this very well.
  • Then add the hung curd. Cook this for 5 minutes.
  • Then add all fried vegetables, green peas and green chilies. Mix it and add some warm water. Cook this for another 10-15 minutes.
  • Check the seasoning. Vegetables should be 80% done and must have some gravy.
  • Turn of the gas. Keep aside.
  • Now take another vessel. Boil some water.
  • Add the whole spices, 5 tsp salt and soaked rice in the boiling water.
  • The rice should be boiled 80%.
  • Drain the water and keep it aside with lid.
  • Take another pan. First put 2 tsp ghee.
  • Put a layer of vegetables then a layer of rice.
  • Add 2 tsp ghee on top, half tsp kewra water.
  • Again put the layer of vegetables and rice.
  • Now add 1 tsp ghee, kewra water and saffron soaked milk on top.
  • Cover the pan with a tight lid and turn on the gas in medium flame for 20 minutes.
  • After 20 minutes turn of the gas and dont open the lid for another 15 minutes.
element.shortDesc: This dish dont need any explanation. Because its 'Biriyani'. Just give it a try and impress your family.

  • 1 inch ginger.
  • 1 tomato chopped.

  • Take a pan heat 2 tsp oil. Add pinch of salt and then add the boiled eggs. Saute it for 2 minutes. Remove the eggs.
  • Heat rest of the oil. Add cumin seeds, bay leaf and dry red chili. Saute it for a minute.
  • Add chopped onion. Fry it till it become light brown.
  • Add ginger and garlic paste. Cook this for 2 minutes.
  • Then add chopped tomatoes , salt and sugar. Cook it for 5 minutes.
  • Add turmeric , cumin and coriander powder. Stir this for 2 minutes.
  • Add the julienne sized potatoes. Stir this for a minute. Then add half glass warm water. Cook this till potatoes are fully cooked.
  • Add the fried eggs and green chilies 10 minutes before you turn off your gas.
  • When the potatoes are done turn off your gas.
  • Finally sprinkle some garam masala on top of it.
element.shortDesc: Its a yummy non vegetarian main course dish. Everybody loves egg. So lets try this curry ...

  • curd one medium bowl
  • black pepper corn 2 tsp
  • five green cardamom
  • six cloves
  • one dry red chili
  • one onion chopped
  • two cloves garlic chopped
  • one inch ginger chopped
  • salt and sugar as per your taste

element.process:
• Coarsely ground black pepper, green cardamom and cloves. Keep it aside.
  • Marinate the chicken pieces with curd and the coarsely grounded spices. Keep the marination in refrigerator for two hours.
  • After two hours take a pan. Heat oil and butter.
  • Add dry red chili and chopped garlic. Saute it for 1 minute.
  • Then add chopped onion. fry it for 5 minutes.
  • Now add the marinated chicken.
  • Add salt and sugar. Cook it for ten minutes.
  • Then add some water and chopped ginger.
  • Cover the pan and cook it 25 minutes in slow flame.
  • Finally check the chicken and gravy.

  • one bunch spinach leaves
  • two tomatoes
  • one inch ginger
  • two green chilis
  • cumin seeds 1 tsp
  • turmeric powder 1/2 tsp
  • coriander powder 1 tsp
  • cumin powder 1 tsp

element.process:

  • Coriander seeds 3 tsp
  • Fennel seeds 3 tsp
  • Dry red chilies 2
  • Whole black pepper 1 tsp
  • Dry fenugreek leaves 3 tsp
  • One medium onion chopped

element.process:
• Take a microwave proof bowl. Put 1-6 ingredients. Heat it in microwave for 2 mins. Then grind it in a grinder. This is kadai masala.
  • Take a pan. Turn the gas on. Heat oil.
  • Add chopped onion. Saute it for 5-7 minutes. Then add turmeric powder, salt and sugar.
  • Add ginger and garlic paste. Cook this till the raw flavour is gone.
  • Add the chicken pieces. Mix it. Cook this with a lid on for 15 minutes in slow flame.
  • After that add 2 tsp of Kadai masala. Mix it.
  • Add tomato puree and green chilis. Mix it well. Cook this for 10-15 minutes in medium flame.
  • After that add cube size onion and bell peppers. Mix it very well. Cook this for only 2 minutes.

element.completionStatement: Your Chicken Tikka Kebab is ready.
element.garnishment:
• Sprinkle some lime juice / chaat masala over your kebabs and enjoy ..!!
  • Every oven has its own temperature. Adjust the temperature according to your oven. I am sharing this according to my oven. So for the safety check the kebabs 1/2 times during the grilling process.
element.ingrediants:
• Boneless chicken cut into cubes (40 pieces)
  • 1 onion cut into cubes
  • 1 green and red bell pepper cut into cubes
  • Cumin seeds 3 tsp
  • Coriander seeds 4 tsp
  • Whole black pepper 1 tsp
  • 2 dry red chili
  • 4 green cardamom
  • 1 small cinnamon stick
  • 1 bay leaf
  • Fennel seeds 1 tsp
  • Hunk curd 6 tsp
  • Red food color a pinch
  • Salt and sugar as per your taste
  • Mustard / white oil 4 tsp
  • Dry fenugreek leaves 2 tsp
  • Bamboo skewers 10 pieces
element.process:
• Take a microwave safe bowl. Put no.4-no.11 in that bowl. Heat those in microwave for 2-3 minutes.
  • Put those in a grinder and make a powder. This is tikka masala.
  • For the marination take a bowl. Put the chicken pieces.
  • Add hunk curd.
  • Add tikka masala.
  • Add salt and sugar as per your taste.
  • Add red food color.
  • Add crushed dry fenugreek leaves.
  • Add oil and mix this very well.
  • Put the marination into the refrigerator for at least 4 hrs.
  • For best result keep it overnight.
  • Soak the bamboo skewers into water for 30 minutes before putting in the oven.
  • When the marination is done take a skewer , put a onion cube then a chicken piece then a bell pepper cube. Repeat this process with all the skewers. (take a look of the picture)
  • Preheat the oven in 400o F for 15 minutes.
  • Brush some oil on the chicken and put the skewers into the oven.
  • Put the chickens closer to the filaments.
  • Turn on the oven in 400o F for 25 minutes.
  • After that take out those, turn the other side and brush some oil.
  • Again put those into the oven in 450o F for 15 minutes.
  • After that take out your kebabs from oven.
element.shortDesc: Its an awesome starter dish.
element.title: Chicken Tikka Kebab

element.completionStatement: Your Fish Mustard Curry is ready.
element.garnishment: • Serve hot with plain rice.
element.ingrediants:
• Fish (in foreign countries you can take Pompano / Tilapia and in India you can take any fishes) 4 pieces.
  • Black mustard seeds 2 tsp.
  • Yellow mustard seeds 3 tsp.
  • Three green chilies.
  • Nigella seeds half tsp.
  • Dry mango powder half tsp.
  • Turmeric powder.
  • Half cup of hot water.
  • One potatoes cut into wedges.
  • Mustard oil 1 small bowl.
  • Salt and sugar as per your taste.
element.process:
• Soak the black and yellow mustard seeds for 1-2 hrs. Then put those in a grinder along with two green chilies, 3 pinches of salt and some water. Make a thick paste.
  • Wash the fish pieces thoroughly into the water.
  • Then marinate the pieces with 1 tsp salt and 1 tsp turmeric powder for 30 minutes.
  • Heat mustard oil in a pan. Fry the fish pieces from both side in the oil.
  • Then remove it from oil.
  • Now fry the potatoes 50%.
  • Then remove the potatoes.
  • As we make the gravy with the same oil so we need only 3 tsp oil. Then remove the excess oil.
  • Add nigella seeds and green chilies into the hot oil.
  • Then add 4 tsp mustard paste and 1 tsp turmeric powder. Saute it for a minute.
  • Add the hot water and salt. Mix it well for 3 minutes.
  • Add fish pieces and potatoes. Cover the pan and cook it for 15 minutes in slow flame.
  • After that check the gravy and potatoes. it should be cooked 100%.
  • Finally add dry mango powder. Mix it and turn off your gas.
element.shortDesc: Its a main course dish.
element.title: Fish Mustard Curry

• Chana (garbanzo beans) 1 small bowl.

  • Ginger and garlic paste 1 tsp.
  • One big fresh tomato.
  • Two green chilies.
  • Cumin seeds 1 tsp.
  • Two dry red chili.
  • Two bay leaves.
  • Turmeric powder 1 tsp.
  • Cumin powder 1 tsp.
  • Coriander powder 1 tsp.
  • Chana masala powder 2 tsp. ( u can get from Indian store )

element.process:
• Soak the garbanzo beans / chana in water overnight.
  • Then boil the beans/chana 60%.
  • Make a paste of tomatoes and green chilies. Keep aside.
  • Heat oil in a pan.
  • Add no.6,7,8 into the hot oil. Saute it for a minute.
  • Then add chopped onion. Fry this until it become golden brown.
  • Add ginger and garlic paste. Cook it for 3 minutes.
  • Then add tomato paste. Stir well.
  • Cover the pan and cook it for 12 minutes in medium flame.
  • After that add no. 9,10,11,12. Mix it for 5 minutes.
  • Add salt and sugar. Mix it.
  • Now add the beans/chana. Stir well.
  • Add the hot water. Cover the pan and cook it for 20 mins in medium slow flame.
  • Check the gravy. It should be medium thin.Also check the beans. It should be 100% cooked.
  • Then add crushed fenugreek leaves and chopped coriander leaves. Mix it well.
  • Finally add onion rings and ginger julians. Then turn off your gas.

element.ingrediants:
• Paneer (Indian cottage cheese) 12-15 cubes
  • Two large tomato
  • One inch ginger
  • Two green chilies
  • Turmeric powder 1 tsp
  • Coriander powder 2 tsp
  • Cumin powder 2 tsp
  • Garam masala powder 1 tsp
  • Dry fenugreek leaves 2 tsp
  • Heavy whipped cream 1 small bowl
  • Salt and sugar as per your taste
  • Half cup of hot water
  • Butter 4 tsp
element.process:
• Make a paste of tomatoes, ginger and green chilies.
  • Shallow fry the paneer cubes in oil. Remove the paneer from pan.
  • After that add 3 tsp butter in hot pan. After melting the butter add no.5-no.8 ingredients. Saute it for 2 mins in slow flame.
  • Then add tomato paste. Stir well. Cook this with lid for 15 minutes in medium slow flame.
  • Then add salt and sugar as per your taste. Mix it.
  • Now add heavy cream in the gravy and stir very well.
  • After 3 mins add the hot water. Mix it.
  • Add the paneer cubes into the gravy. Cover the pan and cook it for 10 minutes in medium flame.
  • Then check the gravy. It should be medium thick like the picture.
  • Add some crushed dry fenugreek leaves. Mix it.
  • Finally add 1 tsp butter and turn off your gas.
